banner_description: Create awareness of Cyberjaya's location & compelling 'reasons-to-believe' for tech businesses and investments to land in Cyberjaya, plus attracting foreign investors and companies to invest in Cybeview as a Tech Hub Developer.

contents.title: Cyberview Social Media Campaign
contents.subtitle: Create awareness of Cyberjaya's location & compelling 'reasons-to-believe' for tech businesses and investments to land in Cyberjaya, plus attracting foreign investors and companies to invest in Cybeview as a Tech Hub Developer.
contents.challenge_result_title: Position Cyberjaya as one of the most influential global the hubs & a investment location for tech co.
contents.challenge_description: Create awareness on Cyberjaya's location & compelling 'reasons-to-believe' for tech businesses and investments to be in Cyberjaya and to attract foreign investors and companies to invest in Cybeview.
contents.results_description: Generating millions of impressions across 6 different countries, and hundreds of leads driving investors interest on Cyberjaya and Cyberview's products.
